enWisdom: The truth is worthier of being followed

Wisdom: الْحَقُّ مَنْجَاةٌ لِكُلِّ عَامِلٍ وَحُجَّةٌ لِكُلِّ قَائِلٍ
enWisdom: Truth is a refuge for every worker (and an argument for every speaker)

Wisdom: أَقْرَبُ الْعِبَادِ إِلَى اللَّهِ تَعَالَى أَقْوَلُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ وَإِنْ كَانَ عَلَيْهِ وَأَعْمَلُهُمْ بِالْحَقِّ وَإِنْ كَانَ فِيهِ كُرْهُهُ
enWisdom: The closest of servants to Allah, the Glorified, is one who speaks the truth even if it is against him and one who acts upon the truth even if there is something he dislikes in it
One who acts upon the truth, gains [from it]

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِلَ بِالْحَقِّ مَالَ إِلَيْهِ الْخَلْقُ
enWisdom: Whoever acts upon the truth, the creation incline towards him

Wisdom: ارْكَبِ الْحَقَّ وَإِنْ خَالَفَ [خَالَفَتْ‏] هَوَاكَ وَلَا تَبِعْ آخِرَتَكَ بِدُنْيَاكَ
enWisdom: Act upon the truth even if is against your desires and do not sell your Hereafter for this world

Wisdom: الْزَمِ الْحَقَّ يُنْزِلْكَ مَنَازِلَ أَهْلِ الْحَقِّ يَوْمَ لَا يُقْضَى إِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ
enWisdom: Cling to the truth and it will take you to the place of the followers of truth, on the day when judgment will not be made except with truth
Cling to the truth and salvation will cling to you
The most just among the creation is one who judges best according to the truth

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِمُوجِبَاتِ الْحَقِّ فَالْزَمُوهَا وَإِيَّاكُمْ وَمُحَالاتِ التُّرَّهَاتِ
enWisdom: Cling to the things that necessitate the [establishment of] truth and beware of the things that transpose falsities [to make them seem true]

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَسْلَمَ لِلْحَقِّ وَأَطَاعَ الْمُحِقَّ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
enWisdom: Whoever surrenders to the truth and follows the rightful [leader] is [considered to be] among the righteous

Wisdom: مَا أَكْثَرَ مَنْ يَعْتَرِفُ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا يُطِيعُهُ
enWisdom: How numerous are those who admit to the truth but do not follow it!

Wisdom: لَا يَكُونَنَّ أَفْضَلُ مَا نِلْتَ مِنْ دُنْيَاكَ بُلُوغَ لَذَّةٍ وَشِفَاءَ غَيْظٍ وَلْيَكُنْ إِحْيَاءَ حَقٍّ وَإِمَاتَةَ بَاطِلٍ
enWisdom: Let not the greatest thing that you achieve in this world be the attainment of pleasures and the quelling of rage, rather let it be the enlivening of truth and the annihilation of falsehood

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْخَلْقِ أَقْضَاهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ وَأَحَبُّهُمْ إِلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَقْوَلُهُمْ لِلصِّدْقِ
enWisdom: The best of creation are those who judge more with truth, and the most beloved among them in the sight of Allah are those who are more truthful in speech

Wisdom: ثَلَاثٌ فِيهِنَّ النَّجَاةُ لُزُومُ الْحَقِّ وَتَجَنُّبُ الْبَاطِلِ وَرُكُوبُ الْجِدِّ
enWisdom: There is salvation in three things: espousing truth, shunning falsehood and working hard
